title: t-206 Christy Matthewson Dark Cap for trade.

posts.post_title: t-206 Christy Matthewson Dark Cap for trade.
posts.post_content:
Looking for PRE 1956 Jackie Robinson's graded 7 or higher by PSA or SGC.

Also looking for any Cobbs Ruths Gehrigs Mantles Dimaggios and any other cool additions.

Let me know if you are open to a trade.
